text: I've heard a lot of great things about this game, often seeing it at the top of the best Vita games in 2013. It wasn't really on my radar before that, but now I'll definitely be buying it when I eventually get a Vita this year. Looks like a very fun platformer and the interaction with the player's fingers through the rear touch pad is a nice touch.
